Send This feature helps us to reproduce unexpected behavior or program crashes. When sending in the Log file of the enviroCar app you help to improve it. This feature uses the default \"Send To\" mechanism. If you invoke it with your Email client, you can easily send the report via email. If you do not have an Email client installed, you can save the log file on a PC, e.g. through Bluetooth or USB. In such cases we appreciate sending in the reporting bundle manually. It is stored at the following location: Approximate minutes past since issue: Additional comments (time past since issue) The enviroCar app was not able to establish the bluetooth connection to the OBD-II adapter. You could try to unplug and plug the adapter, then restart measurements.

Timestamps are automatically included in the logs. Sending us reports helps us reproduce unexpected behavior or crashes. This makes enviroCar better and more stable. Click the send button below to email this report to us. This feature uses the default \"Send To\" mechanism. If you invoke it with your Email client, you can easily send the report via email. Track Upload Successful %s has been successfully pushed as Open Data to the enviroCar platform. Uploading Track %s gets pushed as Open Data to the enviroCar platform. Track Upload Error Error while uploading to the enviroCar platform.
The enviroCar App requires additional permissions for recording tracks, which you can confirm manually in the following. This includes the exact positioning of the smartphone, so that collected parameters of a journey can be spatially located, and the write permission to the external memory, so that logs can be generated and transmitted via the "Report issue" function.
